data.name: Idle Skilling
data.detailed_description:
Afterlife -- the long lost Idle Skilling update

I'm a man of my word, and I've always promised to do at least 1 more Idle Skilling update!

The new Idle Skilling update, Afterlife, is dropping shortly after Steam Release.
(It will also be available on the mobile version, although there will be no crossplay cloudsaving)


About the Game

Idle Skilling is the idle game with ALL the skills!!!



I won't waste your time with a long description, so here's the gameplay loop of Idle Skilling -- if it sounds interesting, go play it!

◉ You start out with basic skills like Strength and Attack. You level those up to fight monsters and earn skill points.
◉ You quickly unlock Mining, Fishing, and Smithing using skill points. You level up mining and fishing to get resources used in smithing to craft upgrades, which help you fight monsters to reach world 2.
◉ Once you reach world 2, you can partially reset your progress and rerun the whole game much faster and progress further. Reach world 3, and you unlock the farming skills of Tilling, Botany, and Apothecary. Level up your tilling by harvesting crops, and botany by planting a series of increasingly exotic flowers, then use them to brew strong potions to buff up and fight monsters even better to reach world 4.
◉ You keep doing this forever, unlocking the other 14 skills and gameplay mechanics (pet breeding, tunnels and construction, crusades, etc) and fighting increasingly difficult mobs over 10 worlds, from the Grasslands all the way to the Maelstrom!!

data.short_description: Idle Skilling is the ultimate Idle Game from 2018. Meant to be played for 5-10 minutes a day, you gradually unlock new skills like mining, fishing, crafting, spiriting, summoning, pet breeding, crusading, tinkering, trekking, lab research, tunneling, and construction. Oh, and 1 final update!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE3 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required. Silence consumes the world of Idle Skilling.
